dialogues.Flemming:
[1]Children are such a joy. 
[2]Any word on the Amalgamated merger? 4. 
[3]And just in time for your partner review no less. 
[4]I look forward to having your antic sense of humor in the partners' suite, Lockwood. It can get a touch dry up there. 
[5] But a double windsor? Come on, son, this isn't the dog track. 
[6]Yes, well, thank you, Dave...?  We are gathered here today to codify the marriage of two bold industry leaders, Kinkabe Technologies and Amalgamated Industries. Mitch starts APPLAUDING. Others.. .hesitantly. . . join in. 
[7]B-Before we sign on the proverbial bottom line, are there any outstanding questions or concerns that we might address? Ask now or forever hold your peace... Pleasant CHUCKLES in the room. Then the Japanese-American CEO of Kinkabe Technologies, KEN KINKABE, 60's, raises his hand. 
[8]Dave? Mitch looks up, sees everyone looking at him. 
[9]No, Dave. Mr. Kinkabe had a question about the DPA ratios. Deer in headlights. 
[10]Well? How are they? 
[11]Good? 
[12]Dave! 
[13]Right now you need to give me one reason not to fire you. Mitch stammers, oh shit. 
[14]It is. 
[15]That's your plan. 
[16]Son, what you've just said to me is highly illegal. You could go to jail for a very long time just for suggesting it... 
[17]I must say, I've never seen this side of you before, Lockwood. I always thought you were on the straight and narrow... 
[18]Fine, I'll roll the dice with you But if word of this gets out, I will throw you under the bus so darn fast you won't know what hit you. Now go put on some proper clothes. You look like Joe Pesci. Flemming Steel III hurries off. Mitch exhales, holy shit... 
[19]It's a fair deal. I don't think we'll get much more out of them... The other execs all nod. Then Mitch BURRRRPS: 
[20]Shut your mouth, Lockwood--! 96. 
[21]How is this...at all... like that? 
[22]Do not listen to him, Ted, he is beyond reckless! If we make too large a counter-offer, we risk driving them away. 
[23]For the record, I did not support 
[24]Good evening, one and all! The room quiets as a PROJECTION SCREEN lowers behind him. 
[25]We are gathered here tonight to celebrate the newest partner in our esteemed firm. For those of you who haven't had the pleasure of working with this brilliant young man, we've prepared this short, mildly embarrassing presentation to introduce him. Please, enjoy... Mitch looks at Jamie, who smiles conspiratorially. Behind the table, Gladys turns on a projector. Some Dido song plays as, on the SCREEN, we start to see PHOTOS from Dave's life... 
[26]David Andrew Lockwood was born on February 1st, 1974, in Palmdale... SHOTS of Dave as a baby appear. Everyone AWWW's. Jamie takes Mitch's hand... 
[27]Dave was a sweet, diligent, hard- working little boy... A SHOT of boyhood Dave in a very dorky 70's Little League outfit flashes onto the screen... 
[28]In high school, Dave belonged to over 17 clubs and teams, and graduated first in his class... 103. SHOTS play of Dave in 80's high school apparel, arguing for the debate team, wearing a goofy beret at French Club, etc... Everyone LAUGHS. Jamie smiles at Mitch, only he looks a little troubled: this is not my life... 
[29]After winning a full scholarship to Princeton, Dave amazingly graduated in just three years... A SHOT of college-age Dave getting his diploma appears... 
[30]And, after graduating from Yale Law School with high honors, Dave clerked for Justice Souter on the United States Supreme Court... A SHOT of young Dave talking with Justice Souter plays... Around the table, the partners MURMUR, impressed. Mitch grows increasingly uncomfortable, shifting in his seat... 
[31]Shortly after, Dave returned west to marry his lifelong best friend, Jamie Anne Johnson... SHOTS roll of Dave and Jamie on their wedding day, laughing. Jamie squeezes Mitch's hand, a happy mist in her eyes. Mitch frowns: this is not my wife... 
[32]Cara came along first, followed by the twins, Peter and Sarah... SHOTS of Dave, wearing scrubs, happily holding his various newborn babies in the hospital flash onto the screen... Cara leans over to Mitch and whispers: 
[33]And somewhere along the way, we were lucky enough to find him... 104. SHOTS roll of Dave as a lawyer, swearing in at the Bar, arguing in court, and, finally, celebrating today's victory. The image fades as the lights in the room slowly rise... 
[34]Industrious. Ambitious. Honorable. They were true of him then, they are even more true of him now. It is my distinct honor to introduce our newest partner, David Lockwood. The room breaks into heartfelt APPLAUSE. 
[35] 
[36] 
[37]Have you forgotten everything you learned in law school?! You can't screw a direct hire! How can we possibly make you a partner now?! You're completely exposed--! We hear a GASP from the doorway. Everyone turns to see Jamie -- she's heard the whole thing. Mitch quickly zips his pants. 107.
